create trigger tgUpdateProgramme on programme after update as 
begin
	set nocount on;
	insert into audit_programme (
		// audit_programme_id,
		create_time,
		action,
		code,
		title
	)
	values(
		// id is auto generated
		current_timestamp,
		'update',
		(select code from deleted),
		(select title from deleted),
	);

	print 'tgUpdateProgramme is fired!'
end
